name: Turretor
description:
HalfSpinMuon Studios presents:

A fun 2D side-view shooter game, where you are the anti-air. A simple, challenging, and dynamic.

As always, any feedback would be wholeheartedly appreciated.

The instructions are in the pause menu, thank you, and HAVE FUN!

(Best in full screen to avoid scrolling)

How to play?
  • Shoot down enemy planes and protect your base!
  • Use your mouse, cursor, or touch to aim your gun, but aim before you shoot:
    • Lift click or hold to shoot
    • Watch your ammo count, you will run dry
    • Watch your gun temperature, it will overheat, and you will have to wait for it to cool back
  • Planes will be dropping bombs on you, so watch out for those explosive surprises, and shoot the planes down before they have a chance!
